org.jstockchart.time
类 SegmentedTimeSeries

java.lang.Object
  org.jstockchart.time.SegmentedTimeSeries

public class SegmentedTimeSeries
extends java.lang.Object

Gets TimeSeriesDataItem and adds "missed" data automatically, then creates TimeSeries.

作者：
Sha Jiang

构造函数详细信息

SegmentedTimeSeries

public SegmentedTimeSeries(java.lang.String name,
                           int step,
                           org.jfree.chart.axis.SegmentedTimeline timeline)
Creates a new SegmentedTimeSeries instance.

参数：
name - the series name
timePeriodClass - the type of time period.
step - the time step.
timeline - the segmented timeline(null is permitted).
